textBox.richText: Designing the product means detailing of product’s 6 components. Each components are generated by combination of design elements. For example, in ‘subscription’ component, in case customer subscribes this product and s/he will be charged at 20$ on ‘General Remains’ balance, subscribe/General Remains/20$ deduct can be derived from conditions/balance/actions elements each. Component can have more than one combination of design elements and designing component looks like making a tree structure with node element.
